text: "Kodachrome" is a 1973 song by Paul Simon and taken from his third album There Goes Rhymin' Simon. It was named after Kodak's Kodachrome slide film. It went to number 2 in Canada and the United States. Category:1973 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Paul Simon songs
title: Kodachrome (song)
